name: iPad Stand
description: This is an iPad stand designed and made by me. Holds an iPad horizontally or vertically with home button still accessible. Molded plywood in Walnut, Teak, Cherry or Oak with a natural durable finish. Hand-bent and welded steel base in a durable powder-coat finish in gloss white or matte black. Originally designed for my wife to be able to read baking recipes in the kitchen. Measures 6" wide, 7" deep and 6" tall. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Hairpin magazine rack
description: This is a hairpin style wall-mounted magazine rack. It was designed and built while I was making hairpin legs. Hand-bent and welded steel in durable powder-coat finish in matte black or gloss white. Leather cord-wrapped option available in drop down. Screw holes sunk in flush with bracket. Holds about a dozen magazines or a few books. Screws and wall anchors included. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Double-jointed swing lamp
description: This is a wall-mount swing lamp made by me. Durable powder-coated finish in matte black. Measures 12" tall and extends 24" from the wall. Available with an exposed bulb brass socket or brass shade. Shade is 4" diameter by 5-1/4" deep and swivels on brass fitting with an on-off switch at back of shade. Wall bracket is powder-coated aluminum. Adjustable height with thumb screw. Cloth twisted cord. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Guitar stand
description: This is a low-mount guitar stand for electric guitars designed and made by me. Molded plywood lower mounts in Walnut or Oak with a natural durable finish. Hand-bent and welded steel base in a durable powder-coat finish in gloss white or matte black. Black rubber bushing backrest. Measures 14" wide, 14" deep and 14" tall. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Tissue Roll Holder
description: This is a tissue roll holder designed and made by me. Bent steel in durable powder-coat finish with solid brass knob. Holds standard size tissue paper roll, that is easily changeable. Available in gloss white, matte black and aqua blue colors. Screws and hollow wall anchors included. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Two-toned pendant lamp
description:
This listing is for one single pendant light. Cloth twisted cord. Socket powder-coated and covered in real wood veneer with a natural hand-rubbed finish. Hard wire option with ceiling canopy and 36" long cord or plug-in option with 120" cord, plug and switch. 40watt globe bulb included.
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

options.name: Yellow/Walnut w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Aqua Blue/Oak w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Red/Cherry w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
White/Ash w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Mint Green/Teak w/ 120" cord, plug and switch

name: Wallace lamp
description: This is a wall-mount swing lamp made by me. Durable powder-coated finish in matte black or gloss white. Measures 18" from top of arch to bottom of tube. Lamp shade is about 12" from wall. Shade is 4" diameter by 5-1/4" deep (available in colored or brass) and swivels on brass fitting with an on-off switch at back of shade. Wall bracket is powder-coated aluminum. Adjustable height with thumb screw. Cloth twisted cord. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Enamel wall sconce
description: This is a hardwired wall sconce. Hand bent steel tubing in farm, tractor and industrial enamels. Comes with 5" wall plate, screws, universal cross bar and wire nuts. Socket reaches about 6" from wall. 40watt globe bulb included. 6 different colors available. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks

name: Shaded tripod desk lamp
description: This is a desk lamp made by me in the spirit of Gretta Grossman's "grasshopper" floor lamp. Hand bent and welded steel in a durable powder-coated finish. Available in gloss white, matte black and seafoam green. Cloth twisted cord with on-off switch and plug. Solid turned brass ball feet. Lamp measures approximately 18" tall, 8" wide and 12" deep. 40watt globe bulb included in 120v or 230v depending on country. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Plywood wall hook
description: This is a molded plywood hook made by me with natural Oak, Walnut or Birch veneer (options shown in 3rd photo). Hook measures 5-1/2" tall, 7/8" wide and protrudes about 2-1/2" away from the wall. Single countersunk screw mounting. Holds keys, bags, hats, coats, jewelry, etc. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: All brass wall sconce
description: This is a hardwired wall sconce made by me. Hand bent solid brass in a natural dull shine. Available in single and double socket versions. Comes with 5" brass wall plate, brass screws, universal cross bar and wire nuts. Sockets reach about 6" from wall and measure about 8" apart on the double version. 40watt globe bulb included. Rated for up to 250volts and 350watts. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Industrial wall lamp
description: This is a wall-mount swing lamp made by me. Durable powder-coated finish. Measures about 30" from wall to end of shade. Shade swivels on brass fitting. Brass socket with on-off switch. 60" cloth twisted cord and plug. Lamp swivels 180 degrees on wall. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks. Rated up to 250v and 300watts.

name: Guitar hook
description:
This is a molded plywood guitar hook made by me with natural Oak, Walnut or Birch veneer (shown in 3rd photo). Hook measures 5-1/2" tall, 3-1/2" wide and protrudes about 4" away from the wall. Single countersunk screw mounting. Holds my Fender guitar about 2" away from the wall. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks. 

*Leather strap in photo made by Wood&Faulk

name: String lights
description:
This is a set of string lights with natural brass sockets and black cloth twisted cord. Candelabra sized sockets with E12 globe bulbs spaced 18" apart. 

Comes in 2 options for male plug end;
9" long with a male plug (for connecting multiples together)
84" long cord with a male plug and on/off switch

9" long cord with female socket on the end. Made to order in about 2-6 weeks

options.name: 10' long strand with 9" long male plug | 7 sockets
10' long strand with 84" cord, plug and switch | 7 sockets
15' long strand with 9" long male plug | 10 sockets
15' long strand with 84" cord, plug and switch | 10 sockets

name: Color pendant lamp
description:
This listing is for one single pendant light. Cloth twisted cord. Socket in durable powder coat finish. Hard wire option with ceiling canopy and 36" long cord, or plug-in option with 120" cord, plug and switch. 40watt globe bulb included (second picture).
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

options.name: White w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Black w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Seafoam Green w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Red w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Schoolbus Yellow w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Charcoal Grey w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Brass w/ 120" cord, plug and switch

name: Hardwired swing arm lamp
description: This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees on wall plate. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coat finish available in black, white, and green. Socket swivels 90 degrees on brass fitting. Steel wall plate with brass fitting and rotary switch. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 250v/300watt bulbs. 16" and 24" lengths. Brass screws, wire nuts and 40watt globe bulb included. Made to order in about 2-6 weeks.

name: Tripod desk lamp
description: This is a desk lamp made by me in the spirit of Gretta Grossman's "grasshopper" floor lamp. Hand bent and welded steel in a durable powder-coated finish. Available in gloss white, matte black and seafoam green. Cloth twisted cord with on-off switch and plug. Solid turned brass ball feet. Lamp measures approximately 18" tall, 6" wide and 12" deep. 40watt globe bulb included in 120v or 230v depending on country. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Telescoping Otis light 24"-36"
description: This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coat finish in matte black or gloss white. Telescoping brass arm with thumb screw. Switched brass socket or smooth brass socket with switch on twisted cloth cord with wall plug. 40 watt globe bulb included. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 300watt bulbs. Length adjusts from 24" to 36". Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Brass swing lamp 16" - 24"
description: This is a brass swing arm wall lamp. Solid brass tubing bent and lightly buffed to a dull shine. Swivels on steel bracket powder-coated black or solid walnut bracket. Available in 16" or 24" lengths. Brass socket swivels 180 degrees on fitting. White cloth twisted cord with on-off switch. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Roxy Walnut rocker
description: This the "Roxy" chair, made by me. The seat and seat back are molded plywood veneered in Walnut. Curved foam cushions wrapped in brown or black leather, or charcoal tweed. The base is welded steel in a matte black durable powder-coated finish. The rocker skids are solid walnut. Chair measures 28" wide, 30" tall, 30" deep. Made to order in about 4-8 weeks. Shipped disassembled, easily assembled.

name: Brass shade swing lamp
description: This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent with durable powder coat finish in white gloss or matte black. 4-1/2" diameter brass shade 6" deep. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 300watt bulbs. About 24" from wall to end of shade, about 22" from top of arm to bottom of shade. Cloth twisted cord with switch. Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided.  Made to order in about 2-4 weeks

name: Wood veneered pendant light
description:
This listing is for one single pendant light. Cloth twisted cord. Socket covered in real wood veneer with a natural hand-rubbed finish. Hard wire option with ceiling canopy and 36" long cord or plug-in option with 120" cord, plug and switch. 40watt globe bulb included.
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

options.name: Walnut w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Teak w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Maple w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
Cherry w/ 120" cord, plug and switch
White Oak w/ 120" cord, plug and switch

name: Swing-arm wall lamp
description: This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coat finish available in 6 colors; black, white, green, red, yellow and grey. Socket swivels 90 degrees on brass fitting. Cloth twisted cord w/ switch. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 300watt bulbs. 16", 24" and 30" lengths. Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Mulifaceted wood planter
description:
Large multifaceted solid wood planter. These are made out of solid recycled chunks of wood, sanded and drilled for small succulents or plants. About 6" wide, 6" long, 8" tall. Treated with protective non-toxic wood treatment. 2" hole fits a 4oz succulent nicely. Every planter is unique and are not all identically shaped or colored. (plant not included) 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Bent plywood magazine rack
description: This is a floor magazine rack, designed and made by me. Bent plywood with real wood veneer in natural Birch, Walnut or Oak; hand sanded and finished. Steel base in durable matte black powder-coat. Solid brass or black ball feet, threaded on for leveling adjustment. Measures 11" deep, 11" wide and 16" tall. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Two-head wall sconce
description: This is a hardwired wall sconce. Hand bent steel tubing in durable black powder-coat. Real wood veneered socket or unfinished brass. Comes with 5" powder-coated wall plate, brass screws, universal cross bar and wire nuts. Sockets reach about 6" from wall and measure about 8" apart. 40watt globe bulb included. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks

name: Solid Brass wall lamp
description: This is a brass swing arm wall lamp. Solid brass tubing bent and lightly buffed to a dull shine. Swivels on steel bracket powder-coated black. adjustable height with thumb screw. Lamp measures about 30" from wall to bulb. Brass socket swivels 180 degrees on fitting. Cloth twisted cord with on-off switch. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Wall storage cabinet
description:
Wall mounted storage cabinet with sliding doors. Veneered with real wood veneer inside and out. Glued and screwed construction makes the cabinet strong yet light and simple. Holds books and small items. Easy to install wall cleat method. Outside dimensions measure 11" x 11" x 35", inside measurements are 9-1/2" x 9-1/2" x 33-1/2" Optional under-mount steel paper rack pictured.

Made to order in about 2-6 weeks

name: Otis wall light 24" white
description:
This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coat finish in white gloss. Real Walnut wood veneer socket that swivels 90 degrees on brass fitting. Cloth twisted cord with switch. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 600watt bulbs. 24" from wall to bulb, bracket is 10" tall. Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided. 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Frances Walnut rocker
description: This is a molded plywood rocking chair, made by me. The seat and seat back are molded plywood veneered in Walnut. Curved foam cushions wrapped in charcoal tweed, or brown or black leather. The base is welded steel in a matte black durable powder-coated finish. The rocker skids are solid walnut. Chair measures 20" wide, 30" tall, 30" deep. Made to order in about 4-8 weeks. Chair shipped disassembled, easily assembled

name: Roxy Walnut armchair
description: This the "Roxy" chair, made by me. The seat and seat back are molded plywood veneered in Walnut. Curved foam cushions wrapped in brown or black leather, or charcoal tweed. The base is welded steel in a matte black durable powder-coated finish. Chair measures 28" wide, 30" tall, 30" deep. Made to order in about 4-8 weeks. Chair shipped disassembled, easily assembled.

name: Brass shade wall lamp 30"
description:
This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coat finish in matte black. 4-1/2" diameter brass shade 6" deep. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 300watt bulbs. 30" from wall to end of shade, bracket is 10" tall. Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided. 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Otis wall light 48"
description:
This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coated finish in matte black or gloss white. Real Teak or Walnut wood veneer socket that swivels 90 degrees on brass fitting. Solid wood ball handle for easy reach swiveling. Cloth twisted cord with switch. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 150watt bulbs. 48" from wall to bulb, bracket is 12" tall. Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided. 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Emerson desk light
description: This is the Emerson light, a desk lamp designed and made by me. Bent plywood base with Walnut veneer in natural finish. Bent steel neck powder-coated matte black. Steel socket veneered in Walnut. Black cloth twisted cord with on-off switch. Lamp measures 16" tall, 12" wide and 12" deep. Lamp head swivels on brass fitting. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Otis wall light 24" black
description:
This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coat finish in matte black. Real Teak wood veneer socket that swivels 90 degrees on brass fitting. Cloth twisted cord with switch. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 300watt bulbs. 24" from wall to bulb, bracket is 10" tall. Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided. 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Chandelier 24"
description:
This is a chandelier light made by me. 24" diameter from socket to socket. 12" from ceiling to bottom. Durable powder coated finish in white gloss or matte black. Brass sockets and hardware. Ceiling canopy included. Sockets are rated for up to 300watt bulbs. Arms fold and unfold for shipping. 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Exposed bulb wall sconce
description: This is a hardwired wall sconce. Hand bent steel tubing in durable black powder-coat. Real wood veneered socket or unfinished brass. Comes with 5" powder-coated wall plate, brass screws, universal cross bar and wire nuts. Socket reaches about 6" from wall. 40watt globe bulb included. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks

name: Otis light 30" black with brass socket
description:
This is a swinging wall lamp made by me. Lamp swivels 180 degrees. Hand bent and welded with durable powder coat finish in matte black. Brass socket with switch and cloth twisted cord. 40 watt tubular edison bulb included. Socket and wiring are rated for up to 600watt bulbs. 30" from wall to bulb, bracket is 10" tall. Screws, wall anchors and mounting instructions provided. 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

options.name: Smooth brass socket, switch on cord

name: Brass pendant light
description:
Brass shade pendant light with ceiling canopy. Shade is solid raw brass measuring 4-1/2" in diameter and 6" deep. 36" Black cloth-covered cord with white ceiling canopy. 
Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.

name: Brass shade wall sconce
description: This is a hard wired wall sconce. Hand bent steel in durable black powder-coat. Unpolished natural brass shade measures about 4" in diameter and 6 deep. Shade reaches about 6" out from wall. Black powder-coated 5" wall plate, brass screws, universal mounting crossbar, wire nuts and 40watt globe bulb included. Made to order in about 2-4 weeks.
